unity.name: Mecha Bash Battle
unity.about: A game based around modular fighting robots made for the Game Design 2 class at Cogswell Polytechnical College.  Made in Unity and C# using the Invector Melee system.

unity.name: Ruined Maze Runner
unity.about: A game based around a maze generator of my own design made for the Level Design 1 class at Cogswell Polytechnical College.  Made in Unity and C# using the Invector Melee system.

unreal.name: Under Maintenance
unreal.about: This VR game was made for Stanford Childerens Hospital during Game Studio 1 at Cogswell Polytechnical College where the entire class worked on it together.
unreal.whatidid: I worked on it as an Engineer and I created most of the first Minigame and I worked on the movement and interaction systems.

minecraft.name: Hykkota Launcher
minecraft.about: Custom Minecraft Launcher written in C#.
minecraft.whatidid: Lead programmer, implementing the library downloader and actual launching of minecraft.

minecraft.name: Bedcraft and Beyond
minecraft.about: This mod introduced modular rugs that could go up and down the sides of slabs, stairs, and full blocks for a connected rug look.  Also included were beds that had three levels of customization: the sheets, the blanket, and the frame itself could be customized depending on materials and dyes used. Made deprecated with Minecraft 1.12 as both carpets and colored beds were in the vanilla game.

minecraft.name: Megaman X Mod
minecraft.about:
This mod was based on different aspects of the Megaman X series. Before discontinuing development of the mod, I was able to implement colorable armor and weapons, a buster that could be charged up and fired, a item stand, and a modular ride armor system.
